str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
Of Hebrew origin; Joannes, the name of four Israelites.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
Compound of heros and eidos; heroic; Herod, the name of four Jewish kings.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.
A woman, wife, my lady. Probably from the base of ginomai; a woman; specially, a wife.
